item.description: We got a Remember the 90's night planned for Friday Oct 5th at the Rosebud. This will be a great night filled with popular 90's dance music, a chance for you to also kick out your favorite 90's tunes during our Karaoke hour. We will have 90's TV and Video's playing across the widescreens and a retro video game station set up to go head to head in competition for a fun prize. So put Friday Oct 5th on your calendar and Join us at the Rosebud for what will be a memorable night.
item.name: Remember the 90's Dance Party @ The Rosebud
